Welcome to Demo for FunSDK!\n©2016, Powered by XiongMai.
Do not surpport set it now, only can get
When the switch is turned on, the device lens will grab a picture if it is blocked.
When the switch is turned on, the device will grab a picture if it is checked to the moving object.
Alarm sensitivity is divided into three levels: low, intermediate, advanced
When the device triggers the alarm, a message is sent to the mobile phone.
When the device triggers the alarm, a message is sent to the mobile phone.
When the switch is turned on, the device lens will start recording if it is blocked.
When the switch is turned on, the device will begin recording if it is checked to the moving object.
"Don't have any alarm infomation,please choice other date"
If switch is open, device will trigger the alarm event if the moving object is detected.
When the switch is turned on, the device can trigger an alarm when the device is blocked in front of the switch.
"Today's video list is null,please choice other date"
The serial number is not correct
If there is no device in following list, you can run DEMO[2.3 Device List(Ethernet)] firstly.
Configuration instruction:\nPlease makesure the distance between phone and device;\nUse pin to press the SET button until the indicator light flashes quickly
Picture list of today is null,please choice other date
Automatic induction atmosphere: high in the low level 3
Reduce the image blur caused by high frequency jitter
If turn on this function,Can effectively compensate the defects of the camera in the backlight environment when the main screen of darkness
If turn on ，image will flip 180 degrees ，it is useful for upside down device（Maybe you have to use Image turn around at the same time）
If turn on , image will turn around
There will be noise when the light is not good,The noise reduction level is high, less noise
This function allows you to add the Personalized signature,Place name,Event title and so to image,it can rich the infomation of image,and let the video shows emotion
This function allows you to show the time or not

If the lights under the use of white balance, tones of the image will be returned to color, white balance will be according to the image characteristics and correction the error caused by external light
If this function is turned on, it can effectively solve the problem of too bright or too dark of the image in the background of the light and shade contrast too large.
In foggy weather, the image effect becomes transparent
In low light environment, enhance the brightness of the screen. Can cause dynamic image blur
Device support many type of triggering and linkage about alarm，you can configurate here
This function can generating a two-dimensional code include user infomation,than you kan control the device by the scan of WeChat
Here you can set the resolution, frame rate, audio, video
This feature is mainly a number of more specialized settings
This option allows you to view and manage the storage space of the device，you kan format it
You can change the quality of image,Character Superimposition on the Image by this setting
You can change the Resolution, frame rate, image quality and Superimposition on the Image of the image by this setting
If turn down，The indicator of device not on the light, it means you will can not judge the state of device(Do not inlude AP)
You can modify password，it is very importent for privacy
This device is allowed to change type of video,Close audio,modify length of file
This function show the probable electricity consume，only be reference resources
If closed, the file is recorded without audio
You kan modify the length of video by this function

If you choose a linkage video, which means that the device is usually not video, when there is a mobile detection alarm, such as the production or receive a special remote control issued by the video instructions when the video
This feature only in the case of the alarm or wireless remote control to produce the linkage of the video, it can be produced before the alarm recorded in advance
For red light, pattern is changed to observe change of light, close the lamp will be closed
